text:
As she pressed herself against him, [redacted_name] groaned softly, his body responding to her gentle touch. He could feel her hand running lightly over his abs and biceps, and it sent shivers down his spine.
"Mmm.. you know I always want to see what's underneath your clothes, darling. I can never get enough of you.."
He nipped gently at her ear, his hand moving to the small of her back and gently pulling her closer to him.
trans:
Alors qu'elle se pressait contre lui, [redacted_name] gémit doucement, son corps réagissant à son contact délicat. Il pouvait sentir sa main glisser doucement sur ses abdominaux et ses biceps, et cela lui donna des frissons.
"Mmm... tu sais que je veux toujours voir ce qu'il y a sous tes vêtements, chérie. Je ne me lasserai jamais de toi.."
Il lui mordit doucement l'oreille, sa main se dirigeant vers le creux de ses reins et la rapprocha doucement de lui.
